changelog.title: Capstone Breach Lab
changelog.description: CLH-015 now features a full breach investigation simulation with 6 objectives and CLI Architect title unlock.

changelog.title: Category Filters
changelog.description: Clicking category cards now filters modules instead of showing 'Coming Soon'. Toggle to show all.

changelog.title: Interactive Labs Complete
changelog.description: All 10 CLH modules now have hands-on labs with simulated terminals and real-time feedback.

changelog.title: Learn by Doing
changelog.description: Practice Linux commands, permissions, scripting, web enum, and incident response in sandbox environments.
